# Wireframe Checklist

Use this checklist when creating or reviewing wireframes.

## Structure

- [ ] Screen title/header defined
- [ ] Navigation elements shown (back, tabs, etc.)
- [ ] Content hierarchy clear
- [ ] Primary action prominent
- [ ] Secondary actions accessible

## States

- [ ] Default state shown
- [ ] Empty state defined
- [ ] Loading state defined
- [ ] Error state defined
- [ ] Success/completion state defined

## Interactions

- [ ] Tap targets identified
- [ ] Gestures documented
- [ ] Transitions described
- [ ] Feedback mechanisms noted

## Accessibility

- [ ] Touch targets ≥ 44×44px
- [ ] Text hierarchy uses semantic heading levels
- [ ] Focus order documented
- [ ] Screen reader announcements noted

## Responsive

- [ ] Mobile portrait (primary)
- [ ] Mobile landscape (if different)
- [ ] Tablet (if applicable)
- [ ] Desktop (if applicable)

## Edge Cases

- [ ] Long text handled (truncation/wrapping)
- [ ] Many items handled (scrolling/pagination)
- [ ] No items handled (empty state)
- [ ] Slow connection handled (loading)
- [ ] No connection handled (offline)

## Annotations

- [ ] Key behaviors explained
- [ ] Non-obvious interactions documented
- [ ] Conditional logic described
- [ ] Animation/transition notes included
